page.title: 04Clubs in the area
page.content: Netley Sailing Club at thw eastern end of Royal Victoria Country Park was originally for the armed services and catered for the personnel attached to the Royal VIctoria Hospital.This huge military hospital was demolished in 1979,113yrs after it was opened. The sailing club srill gives preference to members of the forces but has now opened it's membership to civilians. British Aerospace have very good sports and social club facilities. There are football pitches,tennis courts,badminton,squash,bowling,golf, and sailing sections. Petters also have social clubs but do not compare with B.A.
